name: Hungry Bird World
description:
Hungry Bird World, un juego gratis y sin necesidad de online, donde debes lanzar al pájaro al mar para conseguir peces, pero cuidado con el hambriento tiburón, que intentará comerte a ti.

Una mecánica sencilla, pulsa la pantalla para lanzar al pájaro al mar, cuando estés encima de uno o más peces, y consigue tantos como puedas, esquivando al malvado tiburón, si consigues dos o más peces, tendrás bonus con putos extra.

Hungry Bird World es un juego original, nada que ver con Flappy Bird o Angry Bird, aquí basta con tocar la pantalla para lanzar al pájaro a cazar, mucho más rápido e intuitivo, pasarás horas desbloqueando los 500 peces.

El juego es para todas las edades, niños y niñas, adultos y cualquier persona que tenga ganas de pasar un buen rato.

Gráficos retro estilo pixel art, B.S.O. Original de Guillermo Cañete, original y sobre todo muy muy divertido.

El juego es gratuito y sin necesidad de internet, se puede jugar totalmente offline.
Si descargas el juego encontrarás:

- Bonitos gráficos pixel art.
- B.S.O. Original de Guillermo Cañete.
- 500 peces para desbloquear.
- Rápido y sencillo de jugar, se juega con un solo touch.
- Un mundo redondo donde cazar los peces.
- Juego para niños, niñas y adultos, con gráficos graciosos.
- Sólo 8 megas, se descarga en un plis.
- Juego original e independiente.

No lo pienses más y descarga Hungry Bird World, pasarás horas de diversión coleccionando peces y evitando al molesto tiburón, y podrás jugar con tus niños y niñas, ya que es un juego para todas las edades, gratis y para jugar offline.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In Hungry Bird World you must catch as many fish as you can, but beware, there is a hungry shark that will try to stop it.

To hunt the fish, you must catapult the bird to the sea, make the blobs jump, and get as many fish as you can.

The best eating games on android, is one of those games that do not need wifi, good games and free games.

Mastering this circle game is not easy, it is one of those free birds wicked games, which you will sweat blob a blob to get all the fish unlocked.

I have not said it yet?

This is not a cannon game, it is a slingshot game for free where you can unlock up to 500 fish, but it will not be easy with the hungry shark lurking, it is hungry shark that is always alert.

Overcoming your record will be a challenge, in this free game you will play one and another and another game, to try to surpass yourself and get the complete collection of fish, with your bird 
circling in this circle game, splashing water blob and dodging hungry sharks.

A round ocean, a bird that wants to master that ocean,
fish that flee from birds, and a hungry shark that wants to eat free birds, 
this is one of those killing games that will make you spend hours and hours playing.

The bird is controlled with a simple touch, to catapult the bird into the water by jumping bobs, and hunt as many fish as you can, catch more than 2 fish and get extra bonuses, but beware, the hungry shark will appear to prevent it.

Hungry Bird World is an indie game with beautiful pixelart graphics, effects also pixelart and is suitable for all ages, kids and adults with an original B.S.O Guillermo Cañete.

Play and have fun in this slingshot game for free, one of the best games of eating games in android, a circle game to master the ocean, with the watchful eye of hungry shark.

- Nice and funny pixel art graphics.

- B.S.O. Original by Guillermo Cañete.

- One touch control.

- For all ages, kids and adults.

- 500 fish to unlock.

- Games that dont need wifi.

- Master the sea.

- Circle game.

- Free game.

- The best eating games you're going to play.

- Quick and intuitive.

- Classic Indie game with retro style.

Do not think twice and download this slingshot game for free, good games that do not need wifi, master the sea, avoid the hungry shark and enjoy the best free birds of android.
